projects.title: Pigmo
projects.description: Pigmo is a casino game that I developed in 2013. It is a simple game that is based on the popular game of Pig. The game is written in Java and uses the Swing library for the GUI. The game is a single player game where the player plays against the computer. The game is a simple dice game where the player rolls a die and the computer rolls a die. The player can choose to roll again or hold. The player wins if they reach 100 points before the computer.

projects.title: Equals Sport
projects.description: Equals Sport is a sports betting website that I developed in 2013. The website is written in PHP and uses the CodeIgniter framework. The website allows users to bet on sports events and view live scores. The website also has a blog where users can read about sports news and updates. The website has a simple and clean design that is easy to use. The website is fully responsive and works on all devices.
